name: Pickle
headline: Your AI body double for Zoom calls
description: Over 300 million people join Zoom calls every day, but looking professional in every situation isn’t always easy. Pickle uses an AI body double to replace your live video feed in real time, so you can join meetings without ever turning on your camera. Simply speak, and the AI body double will lip-sync perfectly to your voice—letting you participate in Zoom calls while walking or driving and still appear polished and professional.

founders.name: Sanio Jung, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Pickle, specializing in ML engineering & infrastructure

generated_description:
### Pickle: Your AI Body Double for Zoom Calls

**Overview:**
Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W25, Pickle is based in San Francisco with a lean team of just five employees. Its mission? To help you maintain professionalism during video calls without the hassle of being on camera. There are over 300 million Zoom calls daily—so you can imagine the need for a solution that can ease the pressure of looking "presentable" every time.

**What Does Pickle Do?**
Pickle acts as your AI body double. It replaces your live video feed in real-time, allowing you to join meetings while walking, driving, or even lounging at home. You just speak, and the AI mimics your lips perfectly to your voice, keeping your professional image intact without requiring you to be physically present in front of the camera.

**How Does It Work?**
To create your Pickle, you record a five-minute video. After that, you wait around 36 hours as the AI calibrates to your appearance. Once set up, simply select your AI body double as your camera feed—and voila! You're ready for meetings while truly multitasking and staying engaged.

**Why Pickle?**
In a time when remote work dominates, Pickle provides a unique blend of technology and convenience. No longer do you have to worry about frizzy hair, that last-minute coffee spill, or awkward angles during video calls. Plus, it’s designed to be compatible not just with Zoom but also with platforms like Twitch and TikTok.

**Current Status:**
With endorsement from notable figures and companies, the buzz surrounding Pickle is palpable. Individuals have dubbed it a "game changer" in remote work dynamics, with testimonials highlighting its practicality and effectiveness.

**Key Takeaways:**
- **Founding Date:** 2024
- **Location:** San Francisco, CA
- **Team Size:** 5 employees
- **Y Combinator Batch:** W25
- **Main Offer:** AI body double for video calls
- **Website:** [getpickle.ai](https://getpickle.ai)

In a world where remote meetings are the norm, Pickle offers an innovative tool to streamline your video presence, allowing you to be wherever you need to be—without sacrificing professionalism. Join the future of meetings with Pickle and never worry about your camera facing you again!
